snippet: China's economy grew at its slowest pace in 18 months in the first quarter of 2014, official data showed on Wednesday, with signs of waning momentum already prompting limited government action to steady the world's second-largest economy....

headline.print_headline: China Economic Growth Slows to 18-Month Low in First-Quarter
headline.main: China Economic Growth Slows to 18-Month Low in First-Quarter

lead_paragraph: China's economy grew at its slowest pace in 18 months in the first quarter of 2014, official data showed on Wednesday, with signs of waning momentum already prompting limited government action to steady the world's second-largest economy.
